name: Amogus TD 2 - Defense of the Sus
name_original: Amogus TD 2 - Defense of the Sus
description:
Sussy tower defense game with unlimited ways to play the game.

Choose your map, buy towers and defend against limitless waves of enemies.

- 12 unique towers, each with 2 upgrade paths
- 15 exciting maps
- 10 enemy types
- 3 difficulty levels
- Freeplay mode after beating the map
- Unlimited strategies to beat the game

Help the Amoguses to defend the Sus City!
